titles: A true coppy of the petition of the Lord Maior, aldermen, and the rest of the Common Councell of London, presented to the Honourabe [sic] House of Peeres in Parliament, March 18. 1641.
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: With engraving at head of document.
With an order to print dated: Veneris 18. Martii. 1641 [i.e. 1642].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain. --  Militia --  Early works to 1800.
